title: El lugar que esperaba te esta esperando
subtitle: Meteté en increible mundo que tengo para ti
parrafos: For the past three weeks, I have been trying to create a React app from scratch to understand the set-up with Webpack. My aim was to set up a simple configuration which can then be grown upon. It’s been a struggle to understand Webpack. But thanks to this tutorial by Valentino Gagliardi, I’m much enlightened.
name: react_search
